FuncDef: This command specifies the rate (N) at which traffic is sampled and sent for flow analysis. A packet is sampled every N packets; for example, whensample-rateis configured as 1, then all packets are sent to the cache. Whensample-rateis configured as 100, then every 100th packet is sent to the cache.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the rate at which traffic is sampled. Values-1 to 10000.
